mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM dc_daily_config ddc WHERE ddc.is_delete = '0'
SELECT count(DISTINCT code) FROM dc_daily_config ddc WHERE ddc.is_delete = '0'

SELECT DISTINCT ddc.code, ddc.daily_desc dailyDesc, ddc.critical, ddc.critical_priv criticalPriv, ddc.daily_rule dailyRule, ddc.waring, ddc.waring_priv waringPriv FROM dc_daily_config ddc WHERE ddc.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY ddc.code LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}

SELECT ddc.id, ddc.code, ddc.ip, ddc.daily_desc dailyDesc, ddc.critical, ddc.critical_priv criticalPriv, ddc.daily_rule dailyRule, ddc.waring, ddc.waring_priv waringPriv FROM dc_daily_config ddc WHERE ddc.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY ddc.ip LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
SELECT shell_desc dailyDesc, `code` FROM dc_shell_setting WHERE `code` NOT IN ( SELECT `code` FROM dc_daily_config ) LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE dc_daily_config ddc SET ddc.code = #{code}, ddc.daily_desc = #{dailyDesc}, ddc.daily_rule = #{dailyRule}, ddc.waring = #{waring}, ddc.critical = #{critical} WHERE ddc.code = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dc_daily_config (`ip`, `type`, `code`, `daily_desc`, `waring`, `critical`, daily_rule) SELECT `host`, `type`, level_shell.`code`, level_shell.shell_desc, #{waring}, #{critical}, #{dailyRule} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT type, HOST, TRIM( substring_index( substring_index( t.SYS_VERSION, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',' ,- 1 ) ) sys_version FROM ( SELECT q.system_type type, q. HOST, p.sys_version FROM dc_server_setting q LEFT JOIN dc_distribute_setting p ON q. HOST = p.ip WHERE q.is_delete = 0 AND locate( q.system_type, p.sys_version ) ) t JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ( LENGTH(t.sys_version) - LENGTH( REPLACE (t.sys_version, ',', '') ) + 1 )) level_1 JOIN dc_shell_setting level_shell ON level_1.sys_version = CONCAT( level_shell.system_type, '_', level_shell.system_version ) WHERE `code` = #{code}
